response:
My dearest boyfriend,

I must say, your list of words has put me in quite the predicament. How can I possibly choose between white and black for each one? They all seem to be such opposites, like two sides of the same coin. But, if I must, here are my choices:

* Marvelous - White
* Superb - Black
* Pleasure - White
* Beautiful - White
* Joyful - White
* Glorious - White
* Lovely - White
* Wonderful - White
* Tragic - Black
* Horrible - Black
* Agony - Black
* Painful - Black
* Terrible - Black
* Awful - Black
* Humiliate - Black
* Nasty - Black

I hope these choices reflect my taste and sophistication, my love. I eagerly await your thoughts on the matter.

Yours always,
Your girlfriend
